regen.new_specification: The facility map refresh rate shall be adjustable through database configuration settings, with a default refresh every 2 seconds.

regen.absent_element: clarity on database constraints for GUI control commands
regen.new_specification: The RLCS shall ensure that requests from the GUI for device status changes (control commands) are also subject to the database-defined constraints, similar to those applied to user logins.

regen.absent_element: the adjustable refresh rate for the facility map
regen.new_specification: The refresh rate of the facility map shall be adjustable via the database.

label: Refreshrate of the facility map can be configurable within the database to more than 2 seconds by the user.
absence: action of modifying refresh rate within the database
